sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import currecyFormatter from "currency-formatter" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // import Details from './Details' const Home = () => { const {products} = useSelector(state => state.ProducerReducer); return (
{products.map(product => (
{product.name}
{ currecyFormatter.format(product.price , {code:'USD'})}
{ currecyFormatter.format(product.discount , {code:'USD'})}
))}
) } export default Home
